save_zip(dir, response)

save a zip file from a Flask Response into a local folder.
tilsdk.reporting.response_utils.save_zip(dir, response)

save a zip file from a Flask Response into a local folder.

Parameters:

  • start (Path) – Absolute path of directory for extracting a Flask response’s zipped contents into.

  • response (Flask Response that contains a zipped file.) –

  • dir (pathlib.Path) –

Returns:

Path to folder of unzipped contents.

Return type:

output_path
